channel.title: No-ip
channel.description:
Hello there, I have been getting banned on no-ip for 3 times no and I don`t what I`m doing wrong. I run my xampp and rsps server on the no ip. What could I do to make it stop banning me? And is the something like a .com domain i could buy to redirect to my ip?
Regards Lardain.

item.title: No-ip
